observed_invariants.ac_stability: AC power is stable during all scenarios except Scenario C (abrupt power loss).
observed_invariants.battery_percent: Battery percent transitions align with expected behavior across scenarios.

notes: Scenario C has low confidence in detecting incomplete intervals due to lack of pre-reboot evidence.
Scenario D network postures show consistent behavior across home and hotspot environments.

recommended_operator_actions: Prefer shutdown at 10% battery to avoid abrupt power loss.
Avoid using hotspot for tasks requiring stable network connectivity.
Do not start cascades below 25% battery unless AC power is stable for at least 5 minutes.

future_automation_candidates.task: Automate AC stability checks before starting cascades.
Automate hotspot detection and advisory generation.
required_safeguards: Ensure no critical tasks are running.
